PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-02112003-02-18HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of HARVEY ALLAN SLACK of Ottawa, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Peter A. Allen, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of HARVEY ALLAN SLACK of Ottawa, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Peter A. Allen, whose term has expired.
